# AgentProbe Community

> A comprehensive platform for collecting and visualizing CLI test results from the community, consisting of a secure API backend and an intuitive dashboard frontend.

## Live Services

- [Production API](https://agentprobe-community-production.nikola-balic.workers.dev): Backend API with 20+ endpoints for data submission and retrieval
- [Production Dashboard](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev): Interactive web interface for visualizing community test results
- [API Health Check](https://agentprobe-community-production.nikola-balic.workers.dev/health): Live system status and statistics

## API Documentation

- [Complete API Reference](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/api/endpoints/): All 20 endpoints with authentication and examples
- [Authentication Guide](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/api/authentication/): API key setup, permissions, and security
- [Database Schema](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/api/database/): Complete data model and relationships
- [Deployment Guide](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/api/deployment/): Production deployment and configuration

### Key API Endpoints
- `POST /api/v1/results`: Submit test results
- `GET /api/v1/leaderboard`: Tool performance rankings  
- `GET /api/v1/stats/tool/{tool}`: Tool-specific statistics
- `POST /api/v1/export`: Data export in CSV/JSON formats

## Dashboard Features

- [Live Dashboard](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev): Real-time community statistics and insights
- [Tool Leaderboard](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/leaderboard/): Success rates and performance rankings
- [Scenario Analysis](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/scenarios/): Difficulty rankings and success patterns
- [Component Documentation](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/dashboard/components/): UI component library and usage

## User Resources

- [Getting Started Guide](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/user-guides/getting-started/): Quick setup and API integration
- [API Usage Examples](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/user-guides/api-usage/): Code examples and integration patterns
- [Dashboard User Guide](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/user-guides/dashboard-guide/): Feature walkthrough and tips

## Developer Resources

- [Contributing Guidelines](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/developer/contributing/): Development setup and contribution process
- [System Architecture](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/developer/architecture/): Technical design and technology stack
- [Troubleshooting Guide](https://dashboard.agentprobe.dev/docs/developer/troubleshooting/): Common issues and solutions

## Technology Stack

### Backend API
- **Runtime**: Cloudflare Workers with global edge deployment
- **Framework**: Hono.js for high-performance HTTP handling
- **Database**: Cloudflare D1 (SQLite) with Drizzle ORM
- **Authentication**: API key-based with granular permissions
- **Security**: Rate limiting, input validation, audit logging

### Frontend Dashboard  
- **Framework**: Next.js 15 with App Router and Turbopack
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design system
- **Charts**: Recharts for interactive data visualizations
- **Data**: React Query for state management and caching
- **Deployment**: Cloudflare Workers with static assets

## Project Structure

```
agentprobe-community/
â”œâ”€â”€ packages/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ api/          # Backend API (Cloudflare Workers + Hono)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ dashboard/    # Frontend Dashboard (Next.js)
â”œâ”€â”€ docs/            # Centralized documentation
â””â”€â”€ .github/         # CI/CD workflows for deployment
```

## Data & Analytics

The platform collects and analyzes:
- **Test Results**: Success rates, execution times, error patterns
- **Tool Performance**: Comparative analysis across CLI tools
- **Scenario Difficulty**: Ranking based on success rates and friction points
- **Community Metrics**: Usage patterns and adoption trends

## API Usage Example

```bash
# Submit a test result
curl -X POST https://agentprobe-community-production.nikola-balic.workers.dev/api/v1/results \
  -H "X-API-Key: YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{
    "run_id": "123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000",
    "timestamp": "2025-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "tool": "claude-cli",
    "scenario": "file-operations",
    "execution": {
      "duration": 45.2,
      "total_turns": 8,
      "success": true
    }
  }'
```

## Security & Compliance

- **Authentication**: API key-based with role-based permissions
- **Rate Limiting**: Multi-layered protection against abuse
- **Data Privacy**: Anonymous data collection, no personal information
- **Security Monitoring**: Comprehensive audit logging and threat detection
- **Infrastructure**: Cloudflare's enterprise security features
